part.title: Introduction
part.para: libgedit-gtksourceview is a library that extends GtkTextView, the standard GTK widget for multiline text editing. This library adds support for syntax highlighting, undo/redo, file loading and saving, search and replace, a completion system, printing, displaying line numbers, and other features typical of a source code editor.

refsect1.title: pkg-config name
refsect1.para: For libgedit-gtksourceview &package_api_version;, the pkg-config name is: libgedit-gtksourceview-&package_api_version;
